body:
Hey guys! Certain members in my team are starting to record matches during scrims. Today was the first time a scrim was recorded. It was recorded by lytei, link is below, Enjoy!

Video one recorded by Lytei
Team Rocket scrimmed Mars on Wahiz
Lytei breezily bridged into the wool (9:08)

It was a great scrim! Enjoy! 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4UKvoQrKjmc SUBSCRIBE TO HIM

title: Team Rocket scrim videos!

replies.body: Breezily = childs play, tell me when u can bridge without clicking
